name: Energize
description: A creative agency for earned attention, based in Amsterdam. We create meaningful experiences, clever content and smart campaigns worth sharing. Our aim is to humanize brands. We believe these brands are better equipped to earn peoples attention. We give brands a voice, personality and consciousness. We challenge them to live up to their promises. We work for ambitious brands. Big and small, including PLUS Supermarkets, BLG Wonen, Achmea, HOYA, Mauritshuis, UNICEF and GlaxoSmithKline.
